creator: Bunpo - Learn Japanese
descriptionHtml:
Learn Japanese offline with free, fun lessons. Start learning Japanese now!

Bunpo is a free, fast and easy way to learn Japanese.

This free Japanese learning app provides grammar explanation and lessons for learners of any levels, from JLPT N5 to JLPT N4, JLPT N3, JLPT N2 and JLPT N1.

Get JLPT ready with interactive lessons.
The app offers over 1700 example sentences and 8000 Japanese grammar quiz questions. All comes with English-Japanese translations.

Key features:
Learn Japanese Alphabets (Hiragana and Katakana):
Study both hiragana and katakana easily
Hear how kanas are pronounced

Japanese grammar:
Learn Japanese grammar. Detailed grammar notes in all lesson.
The app contains explanation and exercises for all the grammar points of JLPT N5, JLPT N4, JLPT N3, JLPT N2, JLPT N1.
All Japanese grammar are organized by its JLPT level.

Japanese Vocabulary:
Learn Japanese words in each lesson.
Tap on Japanese words to bring up the smart dictionary. (This feature makes you Japanese learning journey easy)

Learn Kanji:
Improve your kanji recognition by reading Japanese sentences.
Tap on kanji to bring up the smart dictionary. (Works as Japanese translator or dictionary)
Study kanji grouped by JLPT levels.
The app contains over 2500 kanji.

Read Japanese:
Learn to read Japanese language sentences in each lessons.
Great supplement for minna no nihongo (minano nihongo, minna) textbook.
Smart tap function will work as Japanese translator or dictionary.

JLPT:
Japanese grammar notes and exercises for any JLPT level N1 ,N2 ,N3 ,N4 ,N5

Offline mode:
Learn Japanese offline

SRS(spaced repetition system):
Enhance your studying with a personalized Japanese flash cards powered by SRS (spaced repetition system)

Subscription of Bunpo Plus
Subscribe to Bunpo Plus and get access to the complete Bunpo courses, which has hundreds of premium contents, listening training and review system (spaced repetition system) to help you learn Japanese language anywhere, anytime.
descriptionShort: Learn Japanese offline with fun lessons. Start learning Japanese grammar!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
-Fixed typo and error in the quiz
-Bug fixes

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Keeping a subscription when upgrading a phone
Update the latest version of Bunpo app on Android

Switching from iOS to Android:
You can log in to your Bunpo account on your Android phone, with the email address and password of your iOS account.

switching from Android to iOS:
1. Log out of your Bunpo account on your Android phone.
2. Log in to your Bunpo account on your Android phone.
3. you will be able to log in on the iOS device, with the email address and password of your Android account.

Learn Japanese offline with free, fun lessons. Start learning Japanese now!

Bunpo is a free, fast and easy way to learn Japanese.

This free Japanese learning app provides grammar explanation and lessons for learners of any levels, from JLPT N5 to JLPT N4, JLPT N3, JLPT N2 and JLPT N1.

Get JLPT ready with interactive lessons.
The app offers over 1700 example sentences and 8000 Japanese grammar quiz questions. All comes with English-Japanese translations.

Key features:
Learn Japanese Alphabets (Hiragana and Katakana):
Study both hiragana and katakana easily
Listen how kanas are pronounced

Japanese grammar:
Learn Japanese grammar. Detailed grammar notes in all lesson.
The app contains explanation and exercises for all the grammar points of JLPT N5, JLPT N4, JLPT N3, JLPT N2, JLPT N1.
All Japanese grammar are organized by its JLPT level.

Japanese Vocabulary:
Learn Japanese words in each lesson.
Tap on Japanese words to bring up the smart look up. (This feature makes you Japanese learning journey easy)

Learn Kanji:
Improve your kanji recognition by reading Japanese sentences.
Study kanji grouped by JLPT levels.
The app contains over 2500 kanji.

Read Japanese:
Learn to read Japanese language sentences in each lessons.

Japanese listening:
Listen to thousands of Japanese audio files to improve your Japanese listening skill.

JLPT:
Japanese grammar notes and exercises for any JLPT level N1 ,N2 ,N3 ,N4 ,N5

Offline mode:
Learn Japanese offline.

Japanese listening quiz:
Improve your Japanese listening skills by listening and inputting Japanese words.

SRS(spaced repetition system):
Enhance your studying with a personalized Japanese flash cards powered by SRS (spaced repetition system)

Courses under development for English speakers: French, Spanish, Korean, Chinese, German, Italian, Portuguese

Subscription of Bunpo Plus
Subscribe to Bunpo Plus and get access to the complete Bunpo courses, which has hundreds of premium contents, listening training and review system (spaced repetition system) to help you learn Japanese language anywhere, anytime.
descriptionShort: Learn Japanese offline with fun lessons. Start learning Japanese grammar!

French Course

title:
Bunpo: Learn Japanese
2.11.3

creator: Bunpo - Learn Japanese
descriptionHtml:
Learn Japanese with Bunpo, the Japanese Learning app!

With Bunpo, you can learn Japanese with no difficulty! Our app is your comprehensive companion for mastering the Japanese language.

Learn Japanese with interactive lessons in all levels. Our lessons cover JPLT N5, JPLT N4, JPLT N3, JPLT N2, and JPLT N1. Yes, from beginners to striving native speakers, Bunpo will help you.

**Interactive Lessons:**
Buntpo’s extensive library of lessons covering grammar, vocabulary, writing and more will assure you’ll never run out of Japanese lessons to learn.

Bunpo’s knowledgebase has over 1700 example sentences and 8000 Japanese grammar quiz questions for you, and if you feel stuck, don’t worry! They all come with English-Japanese translations.

We’ve meticulously cafted and curated our lessons to provide you with clear explanations and practical examples ensuring you learn Japanese with solid understanding of fundamentals.

Key features:
Learn Japanese Alphabets (Hiragana and Katakana):
Study both hiragana and katakana easily
Listen how kanas are pronounced

**Grammar Mastery:**
Learn Japanese grammar with ease. From basic sentence structure to advanced Japanese grammar points, Bunpo offers detailed explanations and exercises tailored to each JLPT level. Whether you're tackling particles or mastering complex sentence patterns, Bunpo equips you with the knowledge you need to succeed.

**Vocabulary Expansion:**
In order to learn Japanese effectively, expanding your vocabulary is essential.

That is why, with bunpo you can enrich your Japanese vocabulary with Bunpo's curated word lists and smart lookup feature. (This feature makes you Japanese learning journey easy) Simply tap on any Japanese word to access its meaning and pronunciation, facilitating seamless learning as you progress through the lessons.

**Kanji Proficiency:**
Conquer the intricate world of kanji with Bunpo's comprehensive kanji study materials. Grouped by JLPT levels, you'll learn to recognize and read over 2500 kanji characters, enhancing your reading comprehension and language proficiency.

**Reading Comprehension:**
Immerse yourself in authentic Japanese sentences, honing your reading skills with each lesson. Whether it's Hiragana, Katakana, or Kanji, Bunpo guides you through reading Japanese text with confidence and ease. Since reading helps you to learn Japanese even further, we put a lot of effort into helping you read with solid fundamentals.

**Listening Practice:**
Fine-tune your listening skills with Bunpo's vast collection of audio files. Learn Japanese by listening to thousands of Japanese sentences and input Japanese words, strengthening your ability to understand spoken Japanese in various contexts.

**JLPT Preparation:**
Prepare for the JLPT exams with Bunpo's specialized study materials. From N5 to N1, Bunpo provides comprehensive grammar notes, exercises, and listening quizzes to ensure you're well-equipped to ace the test.

**Offline Learning:**
With Bunpo, you can learn Japanese possible anytime, anywhere. Take advantage of offline mode to study Japanese even without an internet connection, making progress at your own pace.

**Spaced Repetition System (SRS):**
Enhance your learning experience with personalized flashcards powered by SRS. Review key concepts and vocabulary at optimal intervals, maximizing retention and accelerating your progress.

Ready to take your Japanese skills to the next level? Unlock the full potential of Bunpo with a subscription to Bunpo Plus. Gain access to premium content, listening training, and a sophisticated review system, empowering you to learn Japanese or French language with confidence.

Whether you're a complete beginner or a seasoned learner, Bunpo is your passport to mastering the Japanese language. Start yourJapanese learning journey today and discover the joy of mastering the Japanese language with Bunpo!
descriptionShort: Learn Japanese. Perfect your Hiragana & Katakana. Japanese Grammar App

2.12.0

creator: Bunpo - Learn Japanese
descriptionHtml:
Learn Japanese with Bunpo!

Learn Japanese offline with fun and interactive lessons. Start learning Japanese now!

Bunpo is a fast and easy way to learn Japanese.

This Japanese learning app provides grammar explanations and lessons for learners of any levels, from JLPT N5 to JLPT N4, JLPT N3, JLPT N2 and JLPT N1.

Get JLPT ready with interactive lessons.
The app offers over 1700 example sentences and 8000 Japanese grammar quiz questions. All come with English-Japanese translations.

Key features:
Learn Japanese Alphabets (Hiragana and Katakana):
Study both hiragana and katakana easily
Listen how kanas are pronounced

Japanese grammar:
Learn Japanese grammar. Detailed grammar notes in all lessons.
The app contains explanations and exercises for all the grammar points of JLPT N5, JLPT N4, JLPT N3, JLPT N2, JLPT N1.
Japanese grammar courses are organized by its JLPT level.

Japanese Vocabulary:
Learn Japanese words in each lesson.
Tap on Japanese words to bring up the smart look up. (This feature makes you Japanese learning journey easy)

Learn Kanji:
Improve your kanji recognition by reading Japanese sentences.
Study kanji grouped by JLPT levels.
The app contains over 2500 kanji.

Read Japanese:
Learn to read Japanese language sentences in each lesson.

Japanese listening:
Listen to thousands of Japanese audio files to improve your Japanese listening skill.

JLPT:
Japanese grammar notes and exercises for any JLPT level N1 ,N2 ,N3 ,N4 ,N5

Japanese listening quiz:
Improve your Japanese listening skills by listening and inputting Japanese words.

Offline mode:
Learn Japanese, French German offline! Bunpo is an offline language learning app.

SRS(spaced repetition system):
Enhance your studying with a personalized flash cards powered by SRS (spaced repetition system)

Subscription of Bunpo Plus
Subscribe to Bunpo Plus and get access to the complete Bunpo courses, which has hundreds of premium contents, listening training and review system (spaced repetition system) to help you learn Japanese or French language anywhere, anytime.
descriptionShort: Learn Japanese offline. Start learning Japanese grammar!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
The streak feature has been added to encourage daily usage.
Minor bug fixes and performance improvements have been made.
